entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
